title: Police: Myrtle Creek man, 19, shot and killed infant daughter, self
content:
MYRTLE CREEK, Ore. - A 19-year-old Myrtle Creek man shot and killed his infant daughter before turning the gun on himself, police said.
Police in the town of 3,400 had been looking for the man's vehicle Monday based on reports the driver might be suicidal.
An officer tried to pull the vehicle over for 1/2 mile before it slowed to a stop.
The officer found Shane Allen Bass slumped down on the driver's seat around 10:30 p.m.
The officer found an infant girl dead in the back seat behind the driver.
Both Bass and his daughter died from gunshot wounds, police said.
Police did not release the name of the infant but identified her as the man's 7-month-old daughter.
This is a developing story. This story will be updated
